item.title: linear algebra done right
item.description: During the study of linear algebra, several asistant materials are referenced: The opencourse 18.06 from Gilbert Strang. From Strang’s home, many valuable materials are available. The textbook Introduction to Linear Algebra by Gilbert Strang. The textbook Linear Algebra Done Right by Sheldon Axler. You can get an abridged version of Linear Algebra Done Right from Axler’s homepage. The textbook Matrix Analysis and Applied Linear Algebra by Carl D. Meyer. By following Professor Strang, I got an overview of the four spaces of one matrix.
